ui.deleteSave: Are you sure you want to delete {fileName}?

intro.description: This is a web port of the original Diablo game, based on source code reconstructed by GalaXyHaXz and devilution team. The project page with information and links can be found over here
intro.gameOwnership: If you own the original game, you can drop the original DIABDAT.MPQ onto this page or click the button below to start playing. The game can be purchased from
intro.compressionOption: Click here to compress the MPQ, greatly reducing its size.
intro.sharewareOption: Or you can play the shareware version for free (50MB download).

errors.createIssue: Click to create an issue on GitHub
errors.invalidMPQ: Please select an MPQ file. If you downloaded the installer from GoG, you will need to install it on PC and use the MPQ file from the installation folder.

compression.description: You can use this tool to reduce the original MPQ to about half its size. It encodes sounds in MP3 format and uses better compression for regular files. To begin, click the button below or drop the MPQ onto the page.
compression.downloadPrompt: Click here if download doesn't start.
